alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 3:44AM EST until January 10 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In New York, Northern Herkimer, Hamilton, Southern Herkimer, Western Rensselaer, Eastern Rensselaer and Eastern Columbia Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The winds will diminish late this morning and then will increase in the afternoon into the early evening again.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
